posts.title: 9 More Books Grimes Can Troll the Paparazzi With
posts.text: Images of the musician reading Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels's 'The Communist Manifesto' after separating from her decidedly non-communist partner, Elon Musk, are going viral. What book should she troll us with next?
